description: Nova-vncproxy used to start up a queue listener as well as a wsgi server.  In a recent refactor, this was accidentally removed.  Now vnc console hangs waiting for a response from vncproxy.
title: nova-vncproxy doesn't listen for queue messages

comments.content: Nova-vncproxy used to start up a queue listener as well as a wsgi server.  In a recent refactor, this was accidentally removed.  Now vnc console hangs waiting for a response from vncproxy.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~vishvananda
